document_data.name: Avroana
document_data.mainbody: '''Avroana''' was a [[Sharran]] high priestess at the [[House of Holy Night]] in the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She wore a mantle of deepest purple, a horned black headdress, and was the tallest priestess at the temple. She didn't smile much, and she had a sharp voice. Her boots had knife-bladed toes.
document_data.Possessions: She carried a lash for ritual purposes.
document_data.Relationships: Dread Brother Elryn was always wary she might be [[scrying]].{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|698|17}}
document_data.Abilities: During the Chaos of [[the Art]] in the {{yearlinkName|767}}, she could cast a spell that teleported several people.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|691|16}} Another of her abilities allowed her to puppeteer a corpse from a distance, and cast flames from their mouth, but appeared to open her to backlash if the corpse was harmed.
